1.title: Mama's Big Fat Secret

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Honey Boo Boo wants Mama June to enter a beauty pageant but June is focused on her new mystery man. Sugar Bear and Jennifer scheme to get more time with Alana and they'll do anything to get it.

2.title: A Pumpkin in the Oven

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Mama is shocked by an unplanned pregnancy. Alana convinces June to start training for a beauty pageant despite her lack of talent. Sugar Bear and Jennifer hire a lawyer who encourages legal action against June.

3.title: Go-Go Juice Gonna Make Mama Win

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: June and ex Sugar Bear face off at mediation! Jennifer schemes to get June out of her life for good while Josh gets the wrath of Mama. Pageant practice with Honey Boo Boo means gulping down go-go juice.

4.title: Boo Boo... You're Fired

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Coach Honey Boo Boo is blindsided when Mama hires a new coach. Feeling neglected, Alana runs away! Jennifer plots to get a DNA test. Pumpkin secretly moves Josh into the house without Mama's permission.

5.title: Project Runaway

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Alana runs away to Sugar Bear's house. Mama blows up when Josh's antics go too far and Pumpkin moves out. Jennifer spies on June's boyfriend. June faces a health emergency.

6.title: Blind-Sided

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: June is rushed to the hospital to save her eye sight! A pregnant Pumpkin has a break down. Jennifer finally receives the DNA results. Is Alana really Sugar Bear's daughter?

7.title: All Eyes on Mama

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: June's eye surgery fails and panic strikes. Alana brings Sugar Bear to yoga to work on his temper but he blows up on Jennifer when he finds the hidden DNA results. Mama has a breakdown at Pumpkin's ultrasound.

8.title: Make Womb for Baby

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: June undergoes another surgery to keep from going blind. Jennifer keeps a huge secret from Sugar Bear. Pumpkin is rushed into labor and June risks everything to be with her- despite her doctor's orders!

9.title: New Baby in Town

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: There's a new baby in town but also a sudden death in the family. June gains weight and can't fit in her pageant dress. Sugar Bear is shocked when he finally learns Jennifer's secret.

13.title: Mama's Big Proposal

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: June, tired of waiting for Geno to ask, pops the question! Alana tells Sugar Bear how she really feels about him. Pumpkin and Josh try home therapy to solve their problems. June and Alana come face to face with their pageant rivals!

14.title: Five, Six, Seven, Ate!

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: June gets a big job offer in Vegas and secretly plans a double wedding! Meanwhile, Alana busts Geno for his response to Mama's proposal! Sugar Bear ruins visitation with Alana. Panic strikes when a pageant dance class runs amok! Mama stress eats.

15.title: Say Yes to the Pageant Dress

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Mean girls ambush June and Alana's pageant dress shopping; Mama's stress eating leads her to a shocking new dress size; Sugar Bear fights to see Alana; Jennifer devises a plan to get revenge on June for ambushing her wedding.

16.title: Worst Day in Pageantry

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: June is shocked when she finds out how much she weighs; all hell breaks loose when June catches Geno on the phone with Jennifer; the morning of the pageant arrives, and Alana makes an unexpected decision.

17.title: Stage Fright & Pageant Fight

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: As show time approaches at the pageant, a frightening emergency sends Alana running for a medic; Mama struggles to squeeze into her pageant dress; Jennifer shows up looking for revenge; panic strikes when the curtains open.

18.title: And the Pageant Winners Are...

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: A mother-daughter pageant duo is crowned; the family heads to Las Vegas where Pumpkin and Josh get pre-wedding jitters; June is blind-sided by surprise guests; Geno reveals his true feelings for June.

1.title: Thin-Tervention

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Mama June is blindsided by Sugar Bear's shocking engagement. And when a revenge diet fails and a hot date bails, June considers major surgery! The most dramatic total body transformation ever begins...

2.title: Operation Tummy Boo Boo

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Mama June goes under the knife for her total body transformation. Disaster strikes when June drives blind on a blind date! When she cheats on her new workout program, June gets ambushed!

3.title: Here Comes the Bridezilla

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Mama June reveals shocking results with the help of new trainer, Kenya. Alana keeps a big secret from Mama. June finally meets Sugar Bear's fiance and it does not go well. At all.

4.title: Let Boo Boo Eat Cake

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Sugar Bear's fiance Jennifer sabotages June's weight loss progress. June goes on a date with the biggest jerk ever! Mama's stress eating sparks surgery dilemma. June and Jennifer go to war over Alana!

5.title: Mama Frankenstein

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Mama June must drop 15 pounds in two weeks! When her junk food stash is exposed, June has a meltdown and is pushed over the edge. Alana and Pumpkin vow to save her, even if it means they must diet too!

6.title: Mama June's Big Reveal

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: A surprise ambush gets June back on track to the most dramatic total body transformation ever! Jennifer drops a wedding bomb. At the final photo shoot reveal, Mama June is unrecognizable!

7.title: Red Hot Mama

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Sugar Bear re-invites June to his wedding; Jennifer goes ballistic! The big day descends into chaos as tornado warnings and June's arrival catch everyone by surprise. June's health takes a sudden turn.

8.title: Too Hot for TV

episode of.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Mama June along with cast and crew go behind-the-scenes and reveal the biggest outtakes and exclusives from this season. June and Jennifer face off for the first time since the wedding. Sugar Bear unleashes rage in a shocking outburst.

imdb.plot outline: June Shannon gained fame as the mother of young beauty pageant contestant Honey Boo Boo on various reality shows. With that notoriety came jokes from comedians and people on social media about her weight. Coming off the end of her marriage to Sugar Bear and facing health issues, Mama June wants to do something about her weight and slim down so she can start a new life with a new body and, she hopes, a new love.
imdb.title: Mama June: From Not to Hot
akas: Mama June: From Not to Hot (United States)
plot: Honey Boo Boo star Mama June discovers her ex Sugar Bear is getting married. Mama June begins a revenge diet so she can look completely different in time for her ex's big day.

June Shannon gained fame as the mother of young beauty pageant contestant Honey Boo Boo on various reality shows. With that notoriety came jokes from comedians and people on social media about her weight. Coming off the end of her marriage to Sugar Bear and facing health issues, Mama June wants to do something about her weight and slim down so she can start a new life with a new body and, she hopes, a new love.::Martin DiConcetto
